about_the_game: The real commander reads the tide of the battlefield and wins the battle with a minimal damage. The situations of eight stages included in this free DLC will vary greatly depending on how you concentrate are and how you make decisions. If your battle time takes too long or if you toys are getting hurt with cumulative damage, try using a new strategy!
detailed_description: The real commander reads the tide of the battlefield and wins the battle with a minimal damage. The situations of eight stages included in this free DLC will vary greatly depending on how you concentrate are and how you make decisions. If your battle time takes too long or if you toys are getting hurt with cumulative damage, try using a new strategy!
name: Toy Clash: Commander of Toys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The real commander reads the tide of the battlefield and wins the battle with a minimal damage. The situations of eight stages included in this free DLC will vary greatly depending on how you concentrate are and how you make decisions.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
